list.description: {@link module:bulb/replies~ControlReply}

list.description: {@link module:bulb/replies~GetConfReply}

list.title: module:bulb.TorConfig
list.description: {@link module:bulb/config~TorConfig}

list.title: module:bulb.TorContext

list.title: module:bulb.TorHttpAgent

list.title: module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand
list.description: Wraps a control command to send over the control port.

list.title: module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand#toString
list.description: Unwraps the command as a raw string.

list.title: module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand~Signal
list.description: Map of control signals.

list.title: module:bulb/config~TorConfig
list.description: Create a valid torrc configuration file.

list.title: module:bulb/config~TorConfig#toString
list.description: Gets the torrc content as a string.

list.title: module:bulb/config~TorConfig#writeLocal
list.description: Writes the torrc locally to the module.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext
list.description: Primary interface for doing things "over tor". Manages a tor process, creates and establishes a control connection, and offers it's own interface for creating and handling connections made through the tor network.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#connect
list.description: Alias for {@link module:bulb/context~TorContext#createConnection} that automatically calls the returned {@link module:bulb/network~HiddenSocket#connect}.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#control
list.description: Connection to the to control port.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#createConnection
list.description: Create a "tor-ified" TCP socket in this {@link module:bulb/context~TorContext}.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#createServer
list.description: Create a "tor-ified" TCP server in this context. Exposes an onion service.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#createTorHttpAgent
list.description: Create a "tor-ified" http.Agent for sending HTTP requests through this context.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#openControlConnection
list.description: Connects the {@link module:bulb/control~TorControl} to the child process.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#process
list.description: Child tor process managed by this context.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#readControlPort
list.description: Reads the tor process control port.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#readSocksPort
list.description: Reads the tor process SOCKSv5 proxy port.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext#spawnTorChildProcess
list.description: Spawns a tor process for this context.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext.create
list.description: Creates a {@link module:bulb/context~TorContext}, automtically calling {@link module:bulb/context~TorContext#spawnTorChildProcess} and {@link module:bulb/context~TorContext#openControlConnection} before resolving.

list.title: module:bulb/context~TorContext.getExecPath
list.description: Returns the local path to the tor bundle.

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#addEventListeners
list.description: Instructs Tor to send asynchronous events for the given types - these events will be emitted from the controller. Calling this method resets previously set event listeners

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#attachStream
list.description: Attaches the specified stream to the given circuit

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#authenticate
list.description: Authenticates with the control port given the supplied param

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#cleanCircuits
list.description: Clears DNS cache and establishes new clean circuits

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#clearDnsCache
list.description: Forget client side hostname->ip cache

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#closeCicuit
list.description: Closes the given circuit

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#closeStream
list.description: Closes the exit for the given stream

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#createAddressMapping
list.description: Instruct Tor to route requests to the target to the replacement

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#createCircuit
list.description: Creates a new circuit, returning the newly created circuit ID

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#createHiddenService
list.description: Establishes a hidden service on the given target

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#destroyHiddenService
list.description: Takes down a running hidden service owned by this controller

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#dropGuards
list.description: Tells the server to drop all guard nodes. Do not invoke this command lightly; it can increase vulnerability to tracking attacks over time.

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#dumpHeartbeat
list.description: Dumps a heartbeat message to the logs

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#dumpStats
list.description: Dump stats to tor log file

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#enableDebug
list.description: Set open logs to debug level

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#event:close
list.description: Fires when the underlying socket closes

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#event:error
list.description: Fired when the underlying socket encounters an error

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#event:ready
list.description: Fires when the controller is authenticated and ready to send commands

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#extendCircuit
list.description: Extends the existing circuit

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#fetchHiddenServiceDescriptor
list.description: Fetches descriptors for the given hidden service

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#getAuthChallenge
list.description: Requests an authentication challenge from tor

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#getConfig
list.description: Return the values for the given configuration key

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#getInfo
list.description: Get information from Tor not stored in configuration

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#getProtocolInfo
list.description: Ask tor for general information

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#halt
list.description: Shutdown tor immediately

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#loadConfig
list.description: Instruct Tor to load the configuration file from the given text

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#postDescriptor
list.description: Inform the server about a new descriptor

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#postHiddenServiceDescriptor
list.description: Launch a hidden service descriptor upload

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#quit
list.description: Tells Tor to hang up on the controller

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#redirectStream
list.description: Change the exit address on a given stream

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#reloadConfig
list.description: Reloads the config values set

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#removeEventListeners
list.description: Instructs Tor to stop listening for events

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#resetConfig
list.description: Change the value for a configuration variable to it's default

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#resolve
list.description: Launch remote hostname lookup - answer returnd as async ADDRMAP event

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#saveConfig
list.description: Tell Tor to write out it's config value to it's torrc

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#setCircuitPurpose
list.description: Sets the purpose of the given circuit

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#setConfig
list.description: Change the value for a configuration variable

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#shutdown
list.description: Controlled shutdown signal

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#signal
list.description: Sends a signal to the control port

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl#takeOwnership
list.description: Take ownership of the tor process - will close tor when the connection closes

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl.createChallengeResponse
list.description: Creates the challenge response from a SAFECOOKIE challenge

list.title: module:bulb/control~TorControl.createReplySplitter
list.description: Creates a message splitter from incoming socket data

list.title: module:bulb/network~HiddenServer
list.description: Wraps a net.Server, exposing it as an onion service.

list.title: module:bulb/network~HiddenServer#address
list.description: Returns the hidden service's address

list.title: module:bulb/network~HiddenServer#listen
list.description: Calls the underlying net.Socket#listen, then establishes a connection as on onion service using the current tor context.

list.title: module:bulb/network~HiddenServer~ConnectionListener
list.description: Handles incoming connections.

list.title: module:bulb/network~HiddenSocket
list.description: Wraps a net.Socket in a stream.Duplex that passes data through the supplied context's tor SOCKSv5 proxy.

list.title: module:bulb/network~HiddenSocket#connect
list.description: Connects the underlying socket to the destination through a tor SOCKSv5 proxy.

list.title: module:bulb/network~TorHttpAgent
list.description: HTTP request agent for proxing requests through Tor.

list.title: module:bulb/network~TorHttpAgent#createConnection
list.description: Implements http.Agent#createConnection to use a {@link module:bulb/network~HiddenSocket}. You probably won't use this directly, instead passing this instance to http#request.

list.title: module:bulb/replies~ControlReply
list.description: Wraps a parsed reply forom the control port.

list.title: module:bulb/replies~ControlReply.ADD_ONION
list.description: Parses the response from the ADD_ONION {@link module:bulb/replies~ControlReply~AddOnionResult}

list.title: module:bulb/replies~ControlReply.AUTHCHALLENGE
list.description: Parses the reply from the AUTHCHALLENGE {@link module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand}.

list.title: module:bulb/replies~ControlReply.GETCONF
list.description: Parses the result of the GETCONF {@link module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand}.

list.title: module:bulb/replies~ControlReply.GETINFO
list.description: Parses the result of the GETINFO {@link module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand}.

list.title: module:bulb/replies~ControlReply.PROTOCOLINFO
list.description: Parses the reply from the PROTOCOLINFO {@link module:bulb/commands~ControlCommand}.
